code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./Integration.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Integration(){const[integrations,setIntegrations]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("/api/integrations").then(res=>setIntegrations(res.data));},[]);const toggleConnection=async name=>{const res=await axios.put("/api/integrations/toggle/".concat(name));setIntegrations(prev=>prev.map(i=>i.name===name?res.data:i));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"integration-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDD17 Integration Center"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"integration-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"System"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Toggle"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:integrations.map(i=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:i.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:i.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:i.connected?"ðŸŸ¢ Connected":"ðŸ”´ Disconnected"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>toggleConnection(i.name),children:i.connected?"Disconnect":"Connect"})})]},i.name))})]})]});}export default Integration;
